examInfo: The MCQ challenge will cover GCP Kubernetes Engine, Kubernetes Components, Kubernetes on Google Cloud, Cluster Architecture, workloads on GKE & how to secure workloads, deploying containerized web application. It will also focus on areas like managing the GKE environment, preparing the GKE environment for production, continous integration with cloud build and delivery pipeline, modern application development, etc.
examDesc:
Prizes

1st Prize
INR 10,000


2nd Prize
INR 5,000

Rules
1. Time duration of Architecting with Google Kubernetes Engine II would be 30 minutes.
2. You will be able to access the problem statement once you click the "Solve Problem" button.
3. Cloud DevJam is open for working professionals only.
4. The prizes will be given ONLY to working professionals.
